ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Neolithic Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make basic neolithic production benches with faster work speed compared to spots.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Neolithic Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make advanced neolithic production buildings to enhance efficiency.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Medieval Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make medieval production benches with faster work speed compared to their neolithic predecessors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Medieval Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make advanced medieval production buildings to enhance efficiency.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Industrial Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make industrial production benches with faster work speed compared to their medieval predecessors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Industrial Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make advanced industrial production buildings to enhance efficiency.
